mapper.select:
select a.*, (select b.SOLUTIONNAME from bi_transform_sign b where b.guid = a.CHECKINSOLUTION) CHECKINSOLUTIONNAME, (select b.SOLUTIONNAME from bi_transform_sign b where b.guid = a.UPLOADEDSOLUTION) UPLOADEDSOLUTIONNAME from BI_TRANSFORM_OBJECT a
and a.TRANSFORMCONFIGGUID=#TRANSFORMCONFIGGUID# and a.ISCHECKIN=#ISCHECKIN# and a.CHECKINSOLUTION=#CHECKINSOLUTION# and a.ISUPLOADED=#ISUPLOADED# and a.UPLOADEDSOLUTION=#UPLOADEDSOLUTION# and a.GUID=#GUID#
order by a.createtime
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BI_TRANSFORM_OBJECT ( guid, transformconfigguid, ISCHECKIN, CHECKINSOLUTION, ISUPLOADED, UPLOADEDSOLUTION, createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid
) select #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TRANSFORMCONFIGGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISCHECKIN:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CHECKINSOLUTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISUPLOADED:VARCHAR:NULL#, #UPLOADEDSOLUTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#
mapper.update:
UPDATE BI_TRANSFORM_OBJECT
updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, TRANSFORMCONFIGGUID=#TRANSFORMCONFIGGUID#, ISCHECKIN=#ISCHECKIN#, CHECKINSOLUTION=#CHECKINSOLUTION#, ISUPLOADED=#ISUPLOADED#, UPLOADEDSOLUTION=#UPLOADEDSOLUTION#,
WHERE guid = #GUID#
